verses.verse: וַיֵּרָ֤א <S%H7200><s%> appeared אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בְּאֵלֹנֵ֖י <S%H436><s%> unto him in the plains מַמְרֵ֑א <S%H4471><s%> of Mamre וְה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> and he sat פֶּֽתַח־ <S%H6607><s%> door הָאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tent כְּחֹ֥ם <S%H2527><s%> in the heat הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> of the day

וַיִּשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> And he lift up עֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּ֔רְא <S%H7200><s%> and looked וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> behold שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> and lo three אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> men נִצָּבִ֖ים <S%H5324><s%> stood עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> opposite וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> by him and when he saw וַיָּ֤רָץ <S%H7323><s%> [them] he ran לִקְרָאתָם֙ <S%H7125><s%> to meet מִפֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> door הָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> them from the tent וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> himself toward the ground

וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> And said אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H113><s%> my lord אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> now מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> if now I have found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> favour בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> please תַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> pass not away מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> I pray thee from thy servant

יֻקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> be fetched נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> I pray you מְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> Let a little מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> water וְרַחֲצ֖וּ <S%H7364><s%> and wash רַגְלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H7272><s%> your feet וְהִֽשָּׁעֲנ֖וּ <S%H8172><s%> and rest yourselves תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הָעֵֽץ׃ <S%H6086><s%> under the tree

וְאֶקְחָ֨ה <S%H3947><s%> And I will fetch פַת־ <S%H6595><s%> a morsel לֶ֜חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread וְסַעֲד֤וּ <S%H5582><s%> and comfort ye לִבְּכֶם֙ <S%H3820><s%> your hearts אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> after that תַּעֲבֹ֔רוּ <S%H5674><s%> ye shall pass on כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So עֲבַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5674><s%> for therefore are ye come עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עַבְדְּכֶ֑ם <S%H5650><s%> your servant וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> as thou hast said כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> So do כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> And they said

וַיְמַהֵ֧ר <S%H4116><s%> hastened אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham הָאֹ֖הֱלָה <S%H168><s%> into the tent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׂרָ֑ה <S%H8283><s%> unto Sarah וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מַהֲרִ֞י <S%H4116><s%> Make ready quickly שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three סְאִים֙ <S%H5429><s%> measures קֶ֣מַח <S%H7058><s%> meal סֹ֔לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine ל֖וּשִׁי <S%H3888><s%> knead וַעֲשִׂ֥י <S%H6213><s%> upon the hearth עֻגֽוֹת׃ <S%H5692><s%> cakes

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַבָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> unto the herd רָ֣ץ <S%H7323><s%> ran אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> and fetcht בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָּקָ֜ר <S%H1241><s%> to the herd רַ֤ךְ <S%H7390><s%> tender וָטוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> and good וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> [it] unto a young man וַיְמַהֵ֖ר <S%H4116><s%> and he hasted לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to dress אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took חֶמְאָ֜ה <S%H2529><s%> butter וְחָלָ֗ב <S%H2461><s%> and milk וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted הַבָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> bull אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> which he had dressed וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> and set לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> [it] before them וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> and he עֹמֵ֧ד <S%H5975><s%> and he stood עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> and תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הָעֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> by them under the tree וַיֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> and they did eat

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֵׅלָׅ֔יׅוׅ <S%H413><s%> unto אַיֵּ֖ה <S%H346><s%> unto him Where שָׂרָ֣ה <S%H8283><s%> [is] Sarah אִשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H802><s%> ess וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> There בָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> Behold in the tent

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said שׁ֣וֹב <S%H7725><s%> I will certainly אָשׁ֤וּב <S%H7725><s%> return אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to you כָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> unto thee according to the time חַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> of life וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold בֵ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> shall have a son לְשָׂרָ֣ה <S%H8283><s%> and lo Sarah אִשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H802><s%> thy wife וְשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H8283><s%> And Sarah שֹׁמַ֛עַת <S%H8085><s%> heard פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> door הָאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> [it] in the tent וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> which אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> which [was] behind him

וְאַבְרָהָ֤ם <S%H85><s%> Now Abraham וְשָׂרָה֙ <S%H8283><s%> and Sarah זְקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> [were] old בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> [and] well stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> in age חָדַל֙ <S%H2308><s%> [and] it ceased לִהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לְשָׂרָ֔ה <S%H8283><s%> to be with Sarah אֹ֖רַח <S%H734><s%> after the manner כַּנָּשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> of women

וַתִּצְחַ֥ק <S%H6711><s%> laughed שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> Therefore Sarah בְּקִרְבָּ֣הּ <S%H7130><s%> within herself לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> After בְלֹתִי֙ <S%H1086><s%> I am waxed old הָֽיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> have לִּ֣י עֶדְנָ֔ה <S%H5730><s%> shall I have pleasure וַֽאדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> my lord זָקֵֽן׃ <S%H2204><s%> being old also

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Wherefore זֶּה֩ <S%H2088><s%> he צָחֲקָ֨ה <S%H6711><s%> laugh שָׂרָ֜ה <S%H8283><s%> did Sarah לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַאַ֥ף <S%H637><s%> yet אֻמְנָ֛ם <S%H552><s%> Shall I of a surety אֵלֵ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> bear וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> a child which זָקַֽנְתִּי׃ <S%H2204><s%> am old

הֲיִפָּלֵ֥א <S%H6381><s%> too hard מֵיְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> any thing לַמּוֹעֵ֞ד <S%H4150><s%> time אָשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> I will return אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> about כָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> unto thee according to the time חַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> of life וּלְשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H8283><s%> and Sarah בֵֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> shall have a son

וַתְּכַחֵ֨שׁ <S%H3584><s%> denied שָׂרָ֧ה ׀ <S%H8283><s%> Then Sarah לֵאמֹ֛ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nay צָחַ֖קְתִּי <S%H6711><s%> I laughed כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for יָרֵ֑אָה <S%H3372><s%> not for she was afraid וַיֹּ֥אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> And he said לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> No כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> did צָחָֽקְתְּ׃ <S%H6711><s%> but thou didst laugh

וַיָּקֻ֤מוּ <S%H6965><s%> rose up מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> And the men וַיַּשְׁקִ֖פוּ <S%H8259><s%> from thence and looked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> toward סְדֹ֑ם <S%H5467><s%> Sodom וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> and Abraham הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went עִמָּ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> them לְשַׁלְּחָֽם׃ <S%H7971><s%> with them to bring them on the way

וַֽיהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אָמָ֑ר <S%H559><s%> said הַֽמְכַסֶּ֤ה <S%H3680><s%> Shall I hide אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I מֵֽאַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> from Abraham אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> that thing which אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> I do

וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> Seeing that Abraham הָי֧וֹ <S%H1961><s%> will surely יִֽהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> shall surely become a great וְעָצ֑וּם <S%H6099><s%> and mighty וְנִ֨בְרְכוּ <S%H1288><s%> shall be blessed ב֔וֹ כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all גּוֹיֵ֥י <S%H1471><s%> and all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יְדַעְתִּ֗יו <S%H3045><s%> For I know לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> so אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> him that יְצַוֶּ֜ה <S%H6680><s%> he will command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֤יו <S%H1121><s%> his children וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> and his household אַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> after him וְשָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> and they shall keep דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do צְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> justice וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> so הָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> may bring יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> upon Abraham אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> that which he hath spoken עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> about

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD זַעֲקַ֛ת <S%H2201><s%> Because the cry סְדֹ֥ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֖ה <S%H6017><s%> and Gomorrah כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> is indeed רָ֑בָּה <S%H7227><s%> is great וְחַ֨טָּאתָ֔ם <S%H2403><s%> and because their sin כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> is indeed כָבְדָ֖ה <S%H3513><s%> grievous מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> is very

אֵֽרֲדָה־ <S%H3381><s%> I will go down נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now וְאֶרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> now and see הַכְּצַעֲקָתָ֛הּ <S%H6818><s%> according to the cry הַבָּ֥אָה <S%H935><s%> of it which is come אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about עָשׂ֣וּ ׀ <S%H6213><s%> whether they have done כָּלָ֑ה <S%H3617><s%> altogether וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not אֵדָֽעָה׃ <S%H3045><s%> unto me and if not I will know

וַיִּפְנ֤וּ <S%H6437><s%> turned their faces מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> the men וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went סְדֹ֑מָה <S%H5467><s%> toward Sodom וְאַ֨בְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> but Abraham עוֹדֶ֥נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> yet עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיִּגַּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> drew near אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said הַאַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> indeed תִּסְפֶּ֔ה <S%H5595><s%> Wilt thou also destroy צַדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with רָשָֽׁע׃ <S%H7563><s%> wicked

אוּלַ֥י <S%H194><s%> Suppose יֵ֛שׁ <S%H3426><s%> Peradventure there be חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty צַדִּיקִ֖ם <S%H6662><s%> righteous בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> within הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> the city הַאַ֤ף <S%H637><s%> indeed תִּסְפֶּה֙ <S%H5595><s%> wilt thou also destroy וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not תִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> and not spare לַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> the place לְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> for חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> the fifty הַצַּדִּיקִ֖ם <S%H6662><s%> righteous אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּקִרְבָּֽהּ׃ <S%H7130><s%> among

חָלִ֨לָה <S%H2486><s%> That be far לְּךָ֜ מֵעֲשֹׂ֣ת ׀ <S%H6213><s%> from thee to do כַּדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> after this manner הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> such לְהָמִ֤ית <S%H4191><s%> to slay צַדִּיק֙ <S%H6662><s%> the righteous עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with רָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> with the wicked וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become כַצַּדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> and that the righteous כָּרָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> should be as the wicked חָלִ֣לָה <S%H2486><s%> that be far לָּ֔ךְ הֲשֹׁפֵט֙ <S%H8199><s%> from thee Shall not the Judge כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> do מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> adversary
